TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A medicine, vitamin, mineral, food supplement, or a combination of them that is being tested in a clinical trial.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "sustancia en estudio"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento, vitamina, mineral, suplemento alimentario o una combinación de ellos que se prueba en un ensayo clínico.
